title: A Comparison Between Q-learning & Deep Q-learning

definitions.Q-learning: A type of reinforcement learning algorithm that seeks to learn the value of actions in states.
definitions.Deep Q-learning: An extension of Q-learning that uses a neural network to approximate the Q-value function.

summary: The slide compares Q-learning and Deep Q-learning, two types of reinforcement learning algorithms. It includes a Q-table and a diagram of a Deep Q-Network (DQN) to illustrate the process of learning in these algorithms.
